privacy_section_1_content: This Privacy Policy explains how Awesome Rank collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our quiz application.
privacy_section_2_intro: We collect the following types of information:
privacy_section_3_content: We use your information for the following purposes:
privacy_section_4_content: We do not sell your personal information. Data may be shared with research partners only in anonymized, aggregated form. We may disclose information if required by law.
privacy_section_5_content: We retain your data for up to 2 years for research purposes. After this period, data is automatically deleted or permanently anonymized.
privacy_section_6_content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
privacy_section_7_content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.
privacy_section_8_content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page.
